title: Shara
description: When her senior prom ended in disaster Shara Wellington withdrew deep into herself, never telling her parents what happened, and living as an invisible woman on her college campus. Professor Josef Ulrik, however, saw something in the shy young woman and on a snowy December night he offered her the Gift of Lycanthropy. Sharaâ€™s world changed that night. She found power and freedom.But the Pack is gathering. There is something quite unique about Shara. Some want to kill her. Others say they have been waiting centuries for her.
author: Steven E. Wedel
